mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Carter, William Champe, d. 1834
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Missed Jefferson's letter dated 23 September regarding lines between neighboring estates; apologizes for the oversight; is sure that Jefferson and [James] Monroe will not wish a survey before spring; Monroe accepted the adjustment of the divisional line.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Monroe, James, 1758-1831
Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1813 December 22, Culpeper, [Virginia], to Thomas Jefferson, n.p.
